data.title: The Man in the Moon | film by Mulligan [1991]
data.meta_description: Other articles where The Man in the Moon is discussed: Robert Mulligan: The Man in the Moon (1991), however, a surprisingly touching coming-of-age piece set in 1957 Louisiana that starred Reese Witherspoon in her film debut, indicated that Mulligan could still fashion a winner, given the proper material. It was the last film he directed.
data.text:
In Robert Mulligan

The Man in the Moon (1991), however, a surprisingly touching coming-of-age piece set in 1957 Louisiana that starred Reese Witherspoon in her film debut, indicated that Mulligan could still fashion a winner, given the proper material. It was the last film he directed.

Read More

In Reese Witherspoon

…debut, portraying a tomboy in The Man in the Moon. That coming-of-age drama was critically acclaimed, and Witherspoon garnered accolades for her performance. Other roles followed, including a supporting role on the television miniseries Return to Lonesome Dove (1993), before she took a break from acting to briefly attend Stanford…
